title: चीते के साथ सो रहा व्यक्ति पीपलेश्वर महादेव मंदिर का नहीं बल्कि साउथ अफ़्रीका का है
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: In Rajasthan at Siriholini Village, daily at night a Cheetah with his family comes and sleeps with the priest of Pipaleshwar Temple . This was going on for a while and one day this guy mentioned it to the wildlife department. They fitted a CCTV to record it.
